column4: Need help restoring a ntfs- partition. I was going to create a arch-linux bootable usb, and accidenatly wrote over my 1TB external hdd instead (ntfs) using
I haven't rebooted yet so I have the output of cat /proc/partitions with info about the old partitions. Is it something I can do with that to restore the partition table?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
